title: Red Tracker Formatting Issues
body: I find it incredibly annoying that the 'quote' section in the boards red tracker doesn't show the proper formatting of the post. For example, in the comments to the Gnar announcements, it shows the entire text, as well as the formatting. This means I have to scroll down the entire Gnar post in order to see Phreak's comment. I also have noticed that occasionally the 'quote' section doesn't show the correct post, instead showing the original comment thread that the post was replying too.

replies.body: +1.  It's definitely an annoyance, but I'm sure it'll be fixed eventually!
